Package org.json

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JSONSerializable
    Subclasses can implement this interface to indicate that they are JSON (de)serializable.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Decoder<T extends JSONSerializable>
    A decoder is used for JSON deserialization.
    Encoder
    The encoder is used to convert JSONSerializable classes to a JSON string
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Decoder.ParseException
    A ParseException is thrown when an exception occurred during JSON parsing
    Encoder.JSONException
    When an exception occurs during JSON encoding, a JSONException is thrown.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    JSONAttribute
    The JSONAttribute annotation is used to represent an attribute in a JSON object used for JSON (de)serialization.
